title: pytorch is less accurate than mxnet on LSTM regression model
body_html:
Hi, I implement a LSTM regression model for sequence labeling using both MXNet and PyTorch with the same network parameters, however, the precision of PyTorch is less than MXNet, though it is ~6 times faster than MXnet:

MXNet: Pearson correlation of prediction: 0.99168
PyTorch: Pearson correlation of prediction: 0.98714

this precision is important for me for publication, so does anyone have any suggestion?

Thanks!

Hi, I implement a LSTM regression model for sequence labeling using both MXNet and PyTorch with the same network parameters, however, the precision of PyTorch is less than MXNet, though it is ~6 times faster than MXnet:

MXNet: Pearson correlation of prediction: 0.99168
PyTorch: Pearson correlation of prediction: 0.98714

this precision is important for me for publication, so does anyone have any suggestion?
